title: determine-restore-eligibility output
description: Output schema of the determine-restore-eligibility action

install_destinations.description: Describe for each node of the cluster if the node is eligible or not to install a new module instance. If not, a reject reason is returned.

instances.description: Number of module instances currently installed on the node

eligible.description: True if another instance of the module can be installed on the node

reject_reason.descripton: If it is an object, it tells why the node is not eligible to host a module instance
